channel.title: CVE Feed for EasyUse Digital Technology -- MailHunter Ultimate
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EasyUse Digital Technology -- MailHunter Ultimate

item.title: CVE-2023-34207|2023-10-17T03:35:35.535Z -- easyuse%20digital%20technology -- mailhunter%20ultimate
item.description: Unrestricted upload of file with dangerous type vulnerability in create template function in EasyUse MailHunter Ultimate 2023 and earlier allows remote authenticated users to perform arbitrary system commands with ‘NT Authority\SYSTEM‘ privilege via a crafted ZIP archive.

item.title: CVE-2023-34210|2023-10-17T04:00:49.629Z -- easyuse%20digital%20technology -- mailhunter%20ultimate
item.description: SQL Injection in create customer group function in EasyUse MailHunter Ultimate 2023 and earlier allow remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the ctl00$ContentPlaceHolder1$txtCustSQL parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-34209|2023-10-17T04:00:28.128Z -- easyuse%20digital%20technology -- mailhunter%20ultimate
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive System Information to an Unauthorized Control Sphere in create template function in EasyUse MailHunter Ultimate 2023 and earlier allow remote authenticated users to obtain the absolute path via unencrypted VIEWSTATE parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-34208|2023-10-17T04:00:05.711Z -- easyuse%20digital%20technology -- mailhunter%20ultimate
item.description: Path Traversal in create template function in EasyUse MailHunter Ultimate 2023 and earlier allow remote authenticated users to extract files into arbitrary directories via a crafted ZIP archive.
